page.title: 19ECOLOGY
page.content:
BIRDS
In our area there are about 30 types of birds.Living near the sea the main types of birds are seabirds and wading birds.These are the birds that we spotted.The seabirds are:the Herrring gull,the Great Blacked Backed Gull,Cormorant,Shag and the Fulmar. Other birds include the Jackdaw,Rook,Carrion crow,House Sparrow,Starling,Oystercatcher, Greenfinch,Lapwing,Swallow,House and Sand Martin,Mistle Thrush,Wood Pigeon, Collared Dove and the Skylark. The Fulmar is rarely seen inland but in May 1985 many Fulmars were nesting in our area.They are only seen inland when there is a storm at sea or they are nesting.
